title: changing regions
body: how can i change my regions? and if i change it can i get back to the old one?

replies.body: You can go back and forth between regions as much as you like, but you do need to purchase a server transfer first. You can check out this [**Account Transfer FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751924-Account-Transfer-FAQ) for all the details!
